docs.title: Intro
docs.text: Dolphin Script is a shell script language written in vanilla PHP.

docs.title: What features does it have?
docs.text:
• New shell script language with a PHP backend
  • Compile and runs in seconds!

Info

Dolphin Script is still in work, as a result, bugs or errors may occur

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text: Var_Name: Name of the variable in string String: Any type of strings Int: Int or float NULL: Only NULL

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
Example 1.

Setting a variable and printing out

SET hello "Hello World"

WRITELINE %hello

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text: String: Any type of strings Int: Int or float NULL: Only NULL Variables: Any variables

docs.title: Examples
docs.text:
Example 1.

Printing out a string

WRITELINE "HELLO WORLD"

Example 2.

Printing out a variable

SET var "Hello World"

WRITELINE %var

docs.title: Installation & Updating of Dolphin Script
docs.text:
Warning

Currently working only on Windows x64 bit

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• Windows 11 or Windows 10
  • x64 bit machine
  • Download and Install PHP on your machine

Info

On x32 bit machines can occur problems!

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
Follow the steps below:

Step 1: Download the tool-kit from my github. Unzip it and paste the dolphin folder into your main drive (C:). Step 2: Download the latest dolphin.phar main file from my discord server or from my github. Step 3: Paste the downloaded dolphin.phar file into the dolphin folder in your main drive. Step 4: Copy the path of the dolphin folder in your main drive.

Now we have the first steps ready. Now we're going to set up the system variable for dolphin script

Step 5: Press Windows and type system variable and click on the first button that pop's up. Step 6: Click on the button in the bottom right corner. Step 7: Now you should see two boxes. Click in the seconds box on Path and then on Edit. Step 8: Click in the new window on New. And paste the path of the dolphin folder. Now you can close all three windows. Step 9: Open a new powershell if you had one open. Now type dolphin --version to check if you have installed correctly.

$ dolphin --version
Dolphin Script (1.02 Dev), Built Version: 16
Copyright (c) Khaled Daghstani

Warning

If it doesn't work after the steps, ask in my discord for help

docs.title: Updating
docs.text: If you want to update your Dolphin Script. Download the new dolphin.phar from my discord or from my github and replace it with the old one.
